#summary Installation instructions for the Just Living codebase.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Requirements =

  * MySQL (Developed on version 3.23.58)
  * PHP (Developed on version 4.3.7)

= Method =

  * Checkout the code  
    * by command line $ svn co ...
    * by tortoisesvn
  * copy config.php.sample to config.php and edit as appropriate
  * move funcs.php to somewhere on the server outside of the public html path, and change the phpinc file to point to it.
  * set up the database tables
  * start adding content :)

= Optional Software =

   * PhpMyAdmin
   * PmWiki
   * AwStats
